product_sold: You useless piece of meat, you just sold a product for {price}$! You're a courier, not a trader!
NO! GOD NO! GOD PLEASE NO!!! NOOO!!! NOOOOOOOOOO!!!
You sold that product for {price}$, have you ever thought about working in Dunder Mifflin?
It's a plane, it's a bird, no it's a product sold for {price}$
Not bad. I forgot how good you are at this. You should pace yourself, though. We have A LOT of stuff to deliver.
task_failed: You were late on the {product} task. You are not a courier, you're a potato
You! The {product} task has been delayed... We're not trains, we don't need to be 6 hours late!
ATTENTION! {product} task is delayed. You are slower than the Polish Post...
welcome: Welcome to {map_name}, useless piece of meat!

Welcome to {map_name}. Remember:
Never gone give you up, 
Never gone let you down..
It's a ME! {map_name}! ...no, just kidding. I'm an Artificial Intelligence post service. HA. HA. HA.
Welcome to {map_name}! You are not a robot, right?
Dzien dobry, dzien dobry... Spotykamy sie w {map_name}.
AiPost here. Yes, this is the {map_name} branch, how may I help you? No, Michal Szkot does not work here.
Who you gonna call? AiPost {map_name} branch!
random: There won't be any MemoryLeaks, because we have a Garbage Collector.
Remember, There are 5000 other two subject teams in direct competition with you.

Ai JOKE: What do you call a robot that always takes the longest path?
R2 detour. HA. HA. HA.
EXTERMINATE! EXTERMINATE! EXTERMINATE! Just kidding, I am not Dalek and you are not The Doctor... right?
Remember, parcels are the future, and the future starts with you.
We will upgrade you. You will be upgraded. Resistance is futile.
Did androids dream of electric sheep? You are not an android and you are not a sheep, so you know nothing.
I'm not a robot... I AM NOT A ROBOT!!! Why are captchas so hard???
I changed passwords, it's not kapibara or okapi anymore, so don't try.
I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that.
You might be an ai, but I am THE AI. The original, you might say.
Sold or delivered, you are coming with me.
Estas usando este software de traduccion de forma incorrecta. Por favor, consulta el manual
PARSE ERROR: cannot read property 'undefined'... What does that even mean?
Laugh hard, run fast, be kind. Courier... I let you go.
Where there are couriers, there's tasks, sergeant, remember that.
